channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: Breakingviews - 苹果公司选择了一条更好的人工智能主导之路
item.description:
Breakingviews - Apple picks a better road to AI dominance https://t.co/2POfNkAZTB https://t.co/2POfNkAZTB

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 印度 Shriram Finance 将取代 UPL 成为蓝筹股 Nifty 50 指数的一员
item.description:
India's Shriram Finance to replace UPL in blue-chip Nifty 50 index https://t.co/SpEZ862Mr8 pic.twitter.com/NBqlo1i1IX

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: Just Eat 外卖公司预测 2024 年核心利润将增长近 40%，其首席执行官吉特斯-格鲁恩（Jitse Groen）表示，一旦目前的股票回购计划于 9 月份结束，该外卖集团将考虑是否有再次回购股票的空间。更多信息
item.description:
Just Eat Takeaway forecast a near 40% rise in 2024 core profit with its CEO Jitse Groen saying the delivery group will see if there is room for another share buyback program once its current one ends in September. Read more: https://t.co/qYzHvhNjgx pic.twitter.com/tWOVMJS9Jm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 看：一位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉 @路透社，苹果公司已经取消了其长达十年之久的电动汽车项目。当对自动驾驶汽车的兴趣席卷硅谷时，这家 iPhone 制造商启动了 "泰坦计划"。
item.description:
WATCH: Apple has canceled its decade-long electric car project, a source familiar with the matter told @Reuters. The iPhone maker kicked off the Project Titan when a wave of interest in self-driving vehicles swept through Silicon Valley https://t.co/V51mnDNLAV pic.twitter.com/J9Xtzf98Ht

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 南非时装零售商的高管们表示，南非时装零售商正在加强本地生产，因为他们正努力减轻港口拥堵造成大量库存交付延误的影响。
item.description:
South African fashion retailers are ramping up local production, executives have said, as they try to mitigate the impact of congestion at ports that has caused massive delays in stock deliveries https://t.co/icPqg1gst1 pic.twitter.com/VSSjcuzljs

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 随着英国豪华汽车制造商阿斯顿-马丁（Aston Martin）推出瓦尔基里（Valkyrie）车型和其他特别版汽车，其销售价格达到创纪录的水平，2023年阿斯顿-马丁的年度亏损减少一半以上，低于市场预期。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Aston Martin's annual losses more than halved in 2023, coming in smaller than market expectations, after selling prices reached record levels as the British luxury carmaker delivered its Valkyrie models and other special edition cars. More here: https://t.co/630a3D1ZsQ pic.twitter.com/56JFaFJ1uB

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：新任首席执行官莉迪亚妮-琼斯（Lidiane Jones）表示，Bumble 将裁员 350 人，约占员工总数的 30%，她将带领 Bumble 度过 "数年未见真正创新 "的行业用户消费低迷期。
item.description:
WATCH: Bumble is set to eliminate 350 jobs, or about 30% of its workforce, it said, as new CEO Lidiane Jones moves to steer Bumble through sluggish user spending in an industry she said ‘hasn't seen true innovation in several years’ https://t.co/yidSqSrq52 pic.twitter.com/JOIEg6BfIe

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: Reckitt 称红海袭击对运费影响 "不大
item.description:
Reckitt says Red Sea attacks having 'small impact' on freight rates https://t.co/hQu93tDGFQ pic.twitter.com/8Su2C7KXi6

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：中国开发商碧桂园因拖欠 2.05 亿美元贷款而被起诉。此举正值中国政府试图增强对占中国国内生产总值四分之一的房地产行业的信心之际。
item.description:
WATCH: A petition has been filed against the Chinese developer Country Garden for non-payment of a $205 million loan. The move has come at a time when Beijing is trying to boost confidence in the industry that accounts for a quarter of country's GDP https://t.co/OECv9daW7g pic.twitter.com/Fh5cYuexZZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：德国公用事业公司 Uniper 预计今年的利润将大幅下降，并将前景归咎于批发能源价格的下降
item.description:
WATCH: German utility Uniper expects to see a significant fall in profit this year, blaming it on lower wholesale energy prices for the outlookhttps://reut.rs/4bVqkEM pic.twitter.com/Eb7TVCgMpi

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 世界银行将精简贷款和投资担保，年度目标为 200 亿美元
item.description:
World Bank to streamline loan, investment guarantees with $20 bln annual goal https://t.co/eKMew3XcbH pic.twitter.com/pr0uWHAH5W

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 印度行业机构要求共同基金限制中小盘基金的流动 - 信
item.description:
India industry body asks mutual funds to limit flows in mid- and small-cap funds - letter https://t.co/N8gwMTJuOK pic.twitter.com/LmvgzabHBx

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：专门生产汽油和电池混合动力汽车的李想汽车公司（Li Auto）迎来了盈利的第一年。即使在竞争对手因需求放缓而苦苦挣扎的时候，创始人李想仍在不断增加电动汽车产品。@KatrinaHamlin 说：这是经过深思熟虑的风险。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Li Auto specializing in hybrid vehicles powered by petrol and a battery, is celebrating its first year of profits. Founder Li Xiang is adding EVs to the line-up even as rivals struggle with slowing demand. It’s a well-calculated risk, says @KatrinaHamlin pic.twitter.com/QdqK8kb6cJ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 交易强劲，加拿大国家银行利润超预期
item.description:
National Bank of Canada profit beats on trading strength https://t.co/L7jFJ8t5j4 pic.twitter.com/gDu2kcF8hE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 中国总理李克强敦促加强与美国的经贸联系
item.description:
China's Premier Li urges stronger economic, trade ties with US https://t.co/kyWnPMJ67l pic.twitter.com/mWbqsBopdY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: Breakingviews - Klarna 现在的首次公开募股比以后的首次公开募股更不合理
item.description:
Breakingviews - Klarna IPO now makes less sense than one later https://t.co/Xf5eVw5SQN https://t.co/Xf5eVw5SQN

item.title: 观看：Just Eat 外卖公司认为 2024 年将为投资者带来可观的利润，这款食品外卖应用预测其核心盈利将增长近 40%，本年度调整后盈利约为 4.87 亿美元。
item.description:
WATCH: Just Eat Takeaway believes 2024 could deliver tasty profits for investors, the food delivery app forecast a near 40% jump in its core earnings seeing adjusted earnings of about $487 million in the current year https://t.co/qYzHvhNR65 pic.twitter.com/QcqSJuSVmj

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 印度 Shriram Finance 将取代 UPL 成为蓝筹股 Nifty 50 指数的一员
item.description:
India's Shriram Finance to replace UPL in blue-chip Nifty 50 index https://t.co/jmI3R1aXEe pic.twitter.com/YZVsmW0c09

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 看：一位消息人士告诉 @路透社，苹果公司已经为其打造电动汽车的项目踩下了刹车，因为这家科技巨头继续在人工智能领域按兵不动。
item.description:
WATCH: Apple has hit the brakes on its project to create an electric car, a source told @Reuters, as the tech giant continues to hold itself back from any big moves in AI https://t.co/V51mnDOjqt pic.twitter.com/2R6VqpCekw

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：高管们表示，南非时装零售商正在加强本地生产，并利用替代海港和空运来减轻传统港口拥堵造成的库存交货大量延误的影响。
item.description:
WATCH: South African fashion retailers are ramping up local production and using alternative seaports and air freight to mitigate the impact of congestion at traditional ports that has caused massive delays in stock deliveries, executives said https://t.co/icPqg1h0iz pic.twitter.com/on1sgCFbpk

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行利息收入增加，利润超出预期
item.description:
Canada's RBC beats profit estimates on higher interest income https://t.co/Fb2wQgF0Gl pic.twitter.com/QcQueohaoe

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：英国汽车制造商阿斯顿-马丁（Aston Martin）表示，由于消费者需求不足，该公司将推迟推出首款电动汽车。
item.description:
WATCH: Aston Martin is delaying the launch of its first electric car because of a lack of consumer demand, it said, as record prices for its luxury and special edition models helped the British carmaker shrink annual losses https://t.co/630a3D2xio pic.twitter.com/8zyJACX9a0

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 亏损收窄，阿斯顿-马丁推迟首款电动汽车的生产
item.description:
Aston Martin delays first electric car as losses narrow https://t.co/T5sapHmr7h pic.twitter.com/a9soGbLGS0

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：陷入困境的开发商碧桂园（Country Garden）披露了一份针对该公司的请愿书，原因是该公司未能偿还价值 2.05 亿美元的贷款，这份请愿书将再次引发人们对中国房地产行业债务危机的担忧。
item.description:
WATCH: In a petition set to revive concerns about the Chinese property sector's debt crisis, embattled developer Country Garden revealed a petition has been filed against the firm over the non-payment of a loan worth $205 million https://t.co/OECv9daohI pic.twitter.com/XVRlWTWN6e

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：来自 @Breakingviews：专门生产混合动力汽车的李想汽车公司迎来了其盈利的第一年。@KatrinaHamlin 说：即使竞争对手正为需求放缓而苦苦挣扎，创始人李想仍通过在产品阵容中增加电动汽车来冒着经过深思熟虑的风险。
item.description:
WATCH: From @Breakingviews: Li Auto which specializes in hybrid vehicles celebrated its first year of profits. Founder Li Xiang is taking a well-calculated risk by adding EVs to the line-up even as rivals struggle with slowing demand, @KatrinaHamlin says pic.twitter.com/M5WNFwpFTq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024
